Text: All the "regulars" went to sleep on this one...thank you Ed for coming through!
Really appreciate this. Thanks very much.

PREVENT the problem of dwindling- or zero seededs:


post to USENET.... then the media is available for at least 1000 days

yes, usenet (now) is a third party paid service, but then so is (ultra) broadband internet

never pay more than $96/yr for uncapped usenet with SSL.  alternatively buy usenet in prepaid blocks which never expire.
